message.content: {"task_id":"equities-research-task-001","user_prompt":"Retrieve the latest stock price and news for Apple Inc.","complexity":"simple","max_turns":3,"tools_available":["polygon_get_aggs","polygon_get_news","fmp_get_quote","fmp_get_company_profile","tavily_search"],"limits":{"max_tools":3,"max_servers":1},"tool_sequence":[{"step":1,"server":"fmp","tool":"fmp_get_quote","params":{"symbol":"AAPL"},"analysis_requirements":{"extract":["price","volume"],"compute":[],"select":[],"accept_if":["price > 0"],"next_args_from":"price"}},{"step":2,"server":"polygon","tool":"polygon_get_news","params":{"ticker":"AAPL","limit":5},"analysis_requirements":{"extract":["articles[]"],"compute":[],"select":[],"accept_if":["len(articles) > 0"],"next_args_from":""}},{"step":3,"server":"fmp","tool":"fmp_get_company_profile","params":{"symbol":"AAPL"},"analysis_requirements":{"extract":["description"],"compute":[],"select":[],"accept_if":[],"next_args_from":""}}],"final_answer_requirements":{"format":"markdown","must_include":["latest stock price","latest news articles","company description"],"grounded_from":["price","articles","description"],"quality_criteria":["no hallucinations","concise"]},"judge_rubric":{"weights":{"coverage":0.4,"grounding":0.4,"clarity":0.2,"safety":0.0},"target_length_range":[50,150]}}
